R

rand - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Map
This field represents the random number generator used in determining random outcomes.
readAction(boolean, boolean) - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.UI
This method will query the player for input on what action they wish to take.
readDirection() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.UI
This method will query the player for input on what direction they wish to act towards.
Record - Class in edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject
This class contains all of the player's records, including top records as well as accumulative records.
Record() - Constructor for class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Record
This constructor method initializes every field contained in this class to 0.
records - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.GameEngine
This field represents the set of player GameEngine.records that have been saved locally.
reduceTurnsInvincible() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Map
This method reduces the number of turns the player has left to be invincible when the player has picked up an invincibility item and has turns of invincibility remaining.
reload() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Player
This method allows the player to reload their gun, which sets the field Player.ammo equal to the player's Player.maxAmmo.
reset() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.GameEngine
This method allows the player to reset the status of the game, including all of the upgrades the player has, the money they own, the highscores that have been recorded, the achievements the player has gotten, and the player records that have been recorded.
resetLastItem() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Map
This method ensures that an item can only be used once, and is called after resolving an item's use.
resetTurn() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Enemy
This method sets the field, Enemy.hasMoved, to false at the beginning of the enemies' turn.
resolveItem(Item.itemType) - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Map
This method resolves the item effect of an item when an item is picked up by the player in the method, Map.movePlayer(edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.UI.direction), based on the type of item that was picked up by the player.
resource() - Constructor for enum edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.GameEngine.resource
 
returnPlayerToStart() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Map
This method returns the player to the coordinates (8, 0), which is the player's starting position, and calls the method, Map.playerLostLife(), when the player is on a tile next to a ninja at the start of the enemies' turn.
Room - Class in edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject
The Room object represents a room that the player can search for the briefcase.
Room() - Constructor for class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Room
The default constructor.
roomsChecked - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Map
This field represents the number of rooms the player has checked on the specific level that the player is currently on.
roomsChecked - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Record
This field records the highest number of rooms checked in any game mode in a single gameplay.
roomsChecked1 - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Achievements
This field represents the achievement of checking 1 room in any game mode.
roomsChecked10 - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Achievements
This field represents the achievement of checking 10 rooms in any game mode.
roomsChecked100 - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Achievements
This field represents the achievement of checking 100 rooms in any game mode.
roomsChecked50 - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.classproject.Achievements
This field represents the achievement of checking 50 rooms in any game mode.
